eta=0.01, n_iter=50, random_state=1): self.eta = eta self.n_iter = n_iter self.random_state = random_state def fit(self, X, y): rgen = np.random.RandomState(self.random_state) self.w_ = rgen.normal(loc=0.0, scale=0.01, size=1+X.shape[1]) self.errors_ = [] for _ in range(self.n_iter): errors = 0 for xi, target in zip(X, y): update = self.eta * (target - self.predict(xi)) self.w_[1:] += update * xi self.w_[0] += update errors += int(update != 0.0) self.errors_.append(errors) return self def net_input(self, X): return np.dot(X, self.w_[1:] + self.w_[0]) def predict(self, X): return
